title: ―URC Maintenance Fund‖ to be set up, by the Commissioner, for the dedicated use of maintenance of common facilities / amenities in the URC by the Corporation
clause_text: ―URC Maintenance Fund‖ to be set up, by the Commissioner, for the dedicated use of maintenance of common facilities / amenities in the URC by the Corporation. The utilisation of the URC maintenance Fund shall be in accordance with the guidelines framed by the Corporation.
section: Formation of Co-operative Housing Societies, and their Federations for buildings in URS -

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
